content: Run `echo -e "\e]2;Implementation: Eliminate BrpMethodParamCategory\007"` to set terminal title
MetaTodo: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Step 1: Create extract_params_from_definition function in handler.rs that uses Parameter definitions
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating extraction function
Step 2: Update handle_brp_method_tool_call to use extract_params_from_definition instead of extract_params_for_type
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating handler
Run `cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings`
Fix any clippy issues
Step 3: Remove all 23 Parameter::port() calls from tool definitions
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing port parameters
Step 4: Remove parameter_extractor field from McpToolDef struct and all tool definitions
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing parameter_extractor
Step 5: Delete BrpMethodParamCategory enum and clean up all references
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after deleting enum
Run `cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings`
Fix any clippy issues
Run `cargo +nightly fmt`
Run `cargo nextest run`
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do a code review focusing on duplication, complexity, and validating the implementation plan
When subagent returns, STOP and review the suggested changes with the user
